adHeader: Mobile Notary Services for East Bay
adDetails: **Mobile Notary in East Bay and surrounding areas** © craigslist - Map data © OpenStreetMap (google map) (yahoo map) Commission Expires 4-2015 My name is Gerald Edson. I am a professional Notary Public providing mobile notary services in the East Bay and surrounding cities. I notarize all types of legal, personal, loan, and business documents. I am conveniently located in Vallejo serving the counties of Solano, Napa, Marin, Sonoma, Western Contra Costa, and East Bay Alameda. I am insured, bonded and background screened. I am also a member of the National Notary Association and a Certified Loan Signing Agent. I have been a California State Commissioned Notary Public for over twelve years. Contact Me: Feel free to contact me to get a no-obligation quote or if you have any questions. Same day appointments available (usually within 90 minutes depending on my schedule). What you will need to provide at the time of signing: 1. Please bring valid identification. Valid Identification, includes any of the below items: State ID Card, Driver's License, US Passport, Mexico Driver's License, an inmate ID card issued by the Dept of Corrections (only) 2. Completed forms - Do not leave any blanks (except for signatures and areas to be notarized. 3. Please review your records for accuracy (correct spelling, names, dates, etc.) Fees: $10.00 per notarized signature. I.E. two signatures notarized would be $20. $30 Mobile Service Fee within 20 miles of Vallejo. Other fees may apply for traveling to cities outside of 20 mile distance. I accept cash and checks.
